title: Jessica Biel cuts a casual figure in a white romper while indulging in retail therapy with her mom
text:
Jessica Biel and her mom Kimberly Biel got some quality bonding time in as they were spotted walking shoulder-to-shoulder on a shopping trip in LA on Saturday.

The Limetown actress wore a white linen jumpsuit with a sweetheart neckline paired with a denim jacket.

Jessica, 37, accessorized with a set of silver and gold layered necklaces as well as some aviator sunglasses.

Sweet: Jessica Biel and her mom Kimberly Biel got some quality bonding time in as they were spotted walking shoulder-to-shoulder on a shopping trip in LA on Saturday

Her feet hit the pavement in some cream-colored strappy sandals in a floral print.

Kimberly wore a white pintucked blouse with floral embroidery and three-quarter sleeves.

She added to her look with a set of agate earrings, a minimal gold necklace and a pair of brown heeled boots.

On-the-go: The Limetown actress wore a white linen jumpsuit with a sweetheart neckline and a denim jacket over it

Busy: Jessica, 37, accessorized with a set of silver and gold layered necklaces as well as some aviator sunglasses

Her feet hit the pavement in some cream-colored strappy sandals in a floral print

Jessica's sighting comes the day after she made headlines with a photo of herself and pop star husband Justin Timberlake in full costume at the Casamigos Tequila Halloween Party in Beverly Hills.

The mom-of-one dressed as an *NSYNC-era Timberlake, donning a curly wig and a metallic jumpsuit, while Timberlake rocked a massive microphone costume.

'This is what happens when you admit on TV that you don't know any NSYNC songs and you're married to @justintimberlake,' she captioned the photo on Instagram. 'Well played, husband, well played.'

So fun: Jessica's sighting comes the day after she made headlines with a photo of herself and pop star husband Justin Timberlake in full costume at the Casamigos Tequila Halloween Party in Beverly Hills

E! News reports that Jessica could be spotted feeding French fries to Timberlake through his costume during the bash.

Additional celebrity attendees included Lisa Rinna, Paris Hilton, Laverne Cox and The Hills: New Beginnings star and Miley Cyrus and Brody Jenner's ex, Kaitlynn Carter.

Nina Dobrev also showed up in a Billie Eilish costume while Gerard Butler and Ryan Phillippe schmoozed with some male pals.
description: Jessica Biel and her mom Kimberly Biel got some quality bonding time in as they were spotted walking shoulder-to-shoulder  on a shopping trip in LA on Saturday.
